Package com.intellij.psi.codeStyle

Class LanguageCodeStyleSettingsProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.psi.codeStyle.CodeStyleSettingsProvider
      • com.intellij.psi.codeStyle.LanguageCodeStyleSettingsProvider
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GroovyLanguageCodeStyleSettingsProvider, HtmlLanguageCodeStyleSettings, JavaLanguageCodeStyleSettingsProvider, JsonLanguageCodeStyleSettingsProvider, PropertiesLanguageCodeStyleSettingsProvider, PyLanguageCodeStyleSettingsProvider, ShLanguageCodeStyleSettingsProvider, XmlLanguageCodeStyleSettingsProvider, YAMLLanguageCodeStyleSettingsProvider

    public abstract class LanguageCodeStyleSettingsProvider
extends CodeStyleSettingsProvider
    Base class and extension point for common code style settings for a specific language.

      • getExternalLanguageId

        public java.lang.String getExternalLanguageId()
        Returns:
        Language ID to be used in external formats like Json and .editorconfig. Must consist only of low case 'a'..'z' characters.

      • createFileFromText

        public PsiFile createFileFromText(Project project,
                                  java.lang.String text)
        Allows to customize PSI file creation for a language settings preview panel.

        IMPORTANT: The created file must be a non-physical one with PSI events disabled. For more information see PsiFileFactory.createFileFromText(String, Language, CharSequence, boolean, boolean) where eventSystemEnabled parameter must be false

        Parameters:
        project - current project
        text - code sample to demonstrate formatting settings (see getCodeSample(LanguageCodeStyleSettingsProvider.SettingsType)
        Returns:
        a PSI file instance with given text, or null for default implementation using provider's language.

      • getDefaultCommonSettings

        @Deprecated
public CommonCodeStyleSettings getDefaultCommonSettings()
        Deprecated. Override #customizeDefaults(CommonCodeStyleSettings, IndentOptions) method instead.
        Creates an instance of CommonCodeStyleSettings and sets initial default values for those settings which differ from the original.
        Returns:
        Created instance of CommonCodeStyleSettings or null if associated language doesn't use its own language-specific common settings (the settings are shared with other languages).

      • getApplicableLanguages

        public java.util.List<Language> getApplicableLanguages()
        Returns:
        A list of languages from which code style settings can be copied to this provider's language settings. By default all languages with code style settings are returned. In UI the languages are shown in the same order they are in the list.
        See Also:
        getLanguagesWithCodeStyleSettings()

      • getLanguagesWithCodeStyleSettings

        public static java.util.List<Language> getLanguagesWithCodeStyleSettings()
        Returns:
        A list of languages with code style settings, namely for which LanguageCodeStyleSettingsProvider exists. The list is ordered by language names as returned by getLanguageName(Language) method.

      • getLanguage

        public abstract Language getLanguage()
        Description copied from class: CodeStyleSettingsProvider
        Specifies a language this provider applies to. If the language is not null, its display name will be used as a configurable name by default if getConfigurableDisplayName() is not overridden.
        Overrides:
        getLanguage in class CodeStyleSettingsProvider
        Returns:
        null by default.

        public static java.lang.String getLanguageName(Language lang)
        Returns a language name to be shown in UI. Used to overwrite language's display name by another name to be shown in UI.
        Parameters:
        lang - The language whose display name must be return.
        Returns:
        Alternative UI name defined by provider.getLanguageName() method or (if the method returns null) language's own display name.

      • getDocCommentSettings

        public DocCommentSettings getDocCommentSettings(CodeStyleSettings rootSettings)
        Returns a wrapper around language's own code documentation comment settings from the given rootSettings.
        Parameters:
        rootSettings - Root code style setting to retrieve doc comment settings from.
        Returns:
        DocCommentSettings wrapper object object which allows to retrieve and modify language's own settings related to doc comment. The object is used then by common platform doc comment handling algorithms.

      • supportsExternalFormats

        public boolean supportsExternalFormats()
        Tells is the provider supports external formats such as Json and .editorconfig. By default it is assumed that language code style settings use a standard way to define settings, namely via public fields which have a straightforward mapping between the fields and human-readable stored values without extra transformation. If not, the provider must implement getAccessor() method for fields using magic constants, specially encoded strings and etc. and getAdditionalAccessors() method for non-stanard properties using their own writer/readExternal() methods for serialization.
        Returns:
        True (default) if standard properties are supported, false to disable language settings to avoid export partial, non-readable etc. data till proper accessors are implemented.
